articles.title: Madrid beats Atlético in shootout, wins Spanish Super Cup
articles.description: JEDDAH, Saudi Arabia (AP) — Real Madrid has beaten Atlético Madrid in a penalty shootout to win the new-look Spanish Super Cup in Saudi Arabia.
articles.content:
JEDDAH, Saudi Arabia (AP) Real Madrid has beaten Atlético Madrid in a penalty shootout to win the new-look Spanish Super Cup in Saudi Arabia.
Madrid won Sunday's shootout 4-1 after the final ended 0-0 after extra time.
